occupation: Director, Marketing & Strategic Initiatives at CEC Entertainment
headline: Marketing & Strategic Initiatives
summary: Accomplished and proven professional with extensive corporate and franchise project delivery experiences and C level executive administration & support. Ten years of IT and business consulting experience within Deloitte Consulting & IBM Global Services.  Recognized as a strong leader with a solid understanding of project life cycle management to support business Operations, Development, Marketing & IT initiatives.  In depth experience managing cross-functional teams for all sizes of companies ranging in revenues from Small Markets to Fortune 500.  Additionally, I have supported C level executives accountable for:  Weekly executive status meetings/minutes, Board quarterly & monthly financial presentation decks, Board communications & scheduling, Franchise Advisory Council quarterly presentation decks, Franchise Business Directors support, facilitation of strategic planning sessions and daily/monthly/yearly calendar management.

experiences.title: Project Manager, Marketing & Strategic Initiatives
experiences.description:
*  Reports directly to the Chief Marketing officer accountable for the overall PMO support across all aspects of the department including campaign transitions & execution, agency management, communications, calendar management and various other project rollouts.  
*  Develops project plans, KPI’s, issues & resolution tracking, status reporting and communications.  Directs the Cross Functional Team’s, (CFT’s) by conducting weekly status meetings to ensure key milestones and project challenges are addressed while ensuring they are delivered on time and within budget. Project examples include:  Campaign windows, rewards/loyalty Punchh mobile app, Olo & Koala, Summer of Fun pass, event pop up concerts and strategic communications calendar.
*  Drives and delivers various strategic initiatives for the Senior Leadership Team across all brands:  Chuck E. Cheese, Peter Piper, Pasqually’s.  Work closely with CFT members and vendors to manage and deliver on time projects.  Key projects include:  Peter Piper Express & Pizzeria proof-of-concepts, transitioning & onboarding a new instore merchandise supplier with distribution and various other test projects focused on increasing traffic and improving revenue.

experiences.title: Sr. Director, Strategic Initiatives & Executive Support
experiences.description:
*  Reported directly to the Chief Executive Officer as acting Chief of Staff.  Led a team in designing out a robust Smartsheet for tracking by store: Average weekly AUV & SSS%, store status & hours of operations changes, cost estimates summaries, SBA loan status, proforma submissions, projections on retarget reopen yes/no, transfers and POS/OLO.
*  Project led cross functional teams to drive and structure strategic initiatives, builds business cases, determines project prioritization & timelines, identify resource supply, acting as internal consultant. 
*  Upon the onboarding of a new Chief Development Officer, moved to Development to structure a PMO around franchise leads, new stores, re-images, transfers stores and accelerated transfers' programs.
*  Directed multiple key initiatives to include POS selection/Pilot, new menu boards & pricing, rollout new Coke dispensers.

experiences.title: Focus On The Family - Worked Part Time
experiences.description:
*  Took family time off from full time career and worked various part time positions at our children's private Christian school:  Substitute teacher (K-12th), Volunteer Coordinator and Cafeteria Aide.  
*  In volunteer position as an Event Chairman for K-5th grade Thanksgiving Mission Project (Dallas Community Partners; raised over $8K); Lead on 20/20 Vision Campaign (Capital for new high school); Yearly Event Chairman- Golf Challenge/Tournament Fund Raiser (Net $45K).

experiences.title: Director, Project Management
experiences.description: Directed the entire Systems Development Life Cycle (SDLC), from requirements to implementation, of the Produce Pro software in all of Hardies four distribution centers:  Dallas, Austin, Houston & San Antonio.

experiences.title: Project Manager
experiences.description: Managed the entire SDLC of the project, from requirements to implementation, for an online ordering website to purchase children’s worship curriculum.

experiences.title: Senior Project Manager
experiences.description:
Neiman Marcus:  Enterprise Data Warehouse development, testing and roll out to support Executive Team, Operations, Purchasing, Marketing and Distribution.
Michaels:  Enterprise Data Warehouse Netezza migration; strategic global sourcing initiatives and Lease Administration software roll out.
